summary: The 988 LGBTQ+ Youth Access Act of 2025 directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services to allocate sufficient resources for LGBTQ+ youth seeking help from the 9-8-8 suicide prevention hotline. The bill acknowledges the high suicide attempt rate among LGBTQ+ youth and the existing specialized services. It amends the Public Health Service Act to mandate the dedication of resources for specialized services and reserves a minimum of 9% of related funding for this purpose.
